mapper.select: SELECT gs.s_display, l.l_no, l.l_high, l.l_highlow, l.l_low, l.l_lowhigh, l.l_delay, l.l_re_alarm, l.l_adjust FROM limit_table l , Group_sensor gs, Sensor_factor sf, Factor f WHERE l.gs_no = gs.gs_no AND gs.g_no = #{g_no} AND l.sf_no = sf.sf_no AND f.f_table_name = #{f_table_name} AND f.f_no = sf.f_no
SELECT j_no, g_no, j_name, j_text, j_target, j_class FROM job WHERE g_no = 0 OR g_no = #{g_no} ORDER BY g_no DESC, j_name
